original: Bergendal, Asta Svea Viola, lasarettsläkare, Karlshamn, f. 15/8/99 i Eksjö av red. Ernst Lindahl o. Judith Johansson. G. 25 m. arkivarie Sten Bergendal. Barn: Catharina o. Jan ff. 33. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 16, med. kand. där 20, med. lic. i Lund 25. Stud:res. t. Engl. 33, Frankr. 37. Div. förordn. v. las. o. sanat. 21-28, e. läk. o. tf. und:läk. v. röntgeninst. o. radiolog. sjukavd. i Lund 28-29, aman. o. und:läk. där 29-31, förordn. s. las :läk. å röntgenavd. v. olika las. 32-37, e. läk. v. radiolog. avd. i Lund 37-38, dito v. röntgenavd. å länslas. i Karlshamn 39, las:läk. där sed. 40. Skr.: några upps. i radiologi.
translated: Bergendal, Asta Svea Viola, hospital doctor, Karlshamn, b. August 15, 1899 in Eksjö, to editor Ernst Lindahl and Judith Johansson. Married on May 25 to archivist Sten Bergendal. Children: Catharina and Jan born in 1933. She graduated from high school in Stockholm in 1916, received her Bachelor of Medicine there in 1920, and her medical license in Lund in 1925. She traveled to England in 1933 and France in 1937 for studies. Held various positions at hospitals and clinics from 1921 to 1938, including deputy doctor, acting assistant doctor, and radiologist. She was appointed as a hospital doctor in various hospitals from 1932 to 1937 and as a radiologist in Lund from 1937 to 1938. She worked as a radiologist at the county hospital in Karlshamn in 1939, and became a hospital doctor there in 1940. She has written some essays on radiology.

structured.name: Asta Svea Viola Bergendal

worksFor.namedPosition: E. Läk. o. tf. und:läk. v. röntgeninst. o. radiolog. sjukavd.
E. läk. v. röntgenavd. å länslas.

structured.description: Swedish hospital doctor and radiologist known for her work in various hospitals and clinics from 1921 to 1938 and her essays on radiology.
